title: How to Make a Chocolate Marshmallow Puff

steps.headline: Make a hole down the middle of the marshmallow; use a knife to do this, or the marshmallow will tear.
Insert a good amount chocolate syrup in the hole.
Put it in microwave on a microwave-safe plate for 20 to 30 seconds.
steps.description: Or cook until the marshmallow has expanded.

steps.headline: Drizzle some chocolate syrup over the marshmallow, and serve hot.

text: Make a hole down the middle of the marshmallow; use a knife to do this, or the marshmallow will tear.  Insert a good amount chocolate syrup in the hole.  Put it in microwave on a microwave-safe plate for 20 to 30 seconds. Or cook until the marshmallow has expanded. Drizzle some chocolate syrup over the marshmallow, and serve hot.
